title: have a recording probleme !!
body:
hey guys 

When i record with OBS it goes good and without any lagging  , but the problem  is when i try to watch what i have recorded 
the video start  lagging 
i tried another videos , and the issue is just with lol recording videos 
i tried fraps , but the recorded video file size is enormous

please leash or help

replies.body:
Unfortunately, I cannot assist you in troubleshooting OBS or the videos you've recorded with it. I strongly recommend reaching out to the OBS Community on [**their forums**](https://obsproject.com/forum/).

Let me know if you have any questions.
